title: Add sdf generating functions for physics / sensors

content.raw:
There are multiple versions of sdf spawning functions in our testing suite 
([ServerFixture](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/bb512e8b7dcc77016370f47520b3183fdb9e27cf/test/ServerFixture.hh?at=default#cl-389),
[joint_test](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/bb512e8b7dcc77016370f47520b3183fdb9e27cf/test/integration/joint_test.hh?at=default#cl-135),
[physics_friction](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/bb512e8b7dcc77016370f47520b3183fdb9e27cf/test/integration/physics_friction.cc?at=default#cl-131)).
Some of these can be consolidated, but it occurred to me that it could be useful to put some of this functionality in the public API (create some simple classes that encapsulate the joint options, then output either sdf as a std::string, or spawn it and return a pointer).
